data.title: Mindless machines
data.statement: You are in a room where employees sit quietly in plastic office chairs in front of empty gray desks.  On each desk, a machine occasionally ejects a strip of paper with numbers on it.  The employees then write answers on the back of the slips and drop them into chutes, disappearing into the abyss.  An assistant ushers you to an empty desk.  You begin to ask what you are supposed to do, but all you receive back from the nearby people are dismissive, cold stares.  Fortunately you find a few strips on the floor that missed the slot from the previous occupant.  That recruiter sure is going to get an ear-full from you tomorrow!
data.constraints: It appears that there are only sequences of numbers.  You can't tell much else at a brief glance.
data.inputDescription: Each strip contains a sequence of digits
data.outputDescription: Each slip you found also has numbers scrawled on the back

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are in a room where employees sit quietly in plastic office chairs in front of empty gray desks. On each desk, a machine occasionally ejects a strip of paper with numbers on it. The employees then write answers on the back of the slips and drop them into chutes, disappearing into the abyss. An assistant ushers you to an empty desk. You begin to ask what you are supposed to do, but all you receive back from the nearby people are dismissive, cold stares. Fortunately you find a few strips on the floor that missed the slot from the previous occupant. That recruiter sure is going to get an ear-full from you tomorrow!
Input
Each strip contains a sequence of digits
Output
Each slip you found also has numbers scrawled on the back
Constraints
It appears that there are only sequences of numbers. You can't tell much else at a brief glance.
Example
Input
1235
Output
11121315
